name: 格兹德·西加奇
name_full: 格兹德·西加奇 Gözde Cigaci

last_movies.title: 我们这一天 第二季
我们这一天 第一季

introduction: Turkish actress known for her work in several Turkish television series' as well as feature films. She is recognized for her recurring roles as Sureyya Ataman in the 2013 series Bugunun Saraylisi and as the character Gokce in the 2016 series Kordugum.Her television debut came in 2011 when she was cast as the recurring character Elif in the series Magnificent Century. After several more television appearances, she went on to make her feature film debut in the 2014 film Whisper If I Forget where she played the character Hanife.In addition to acting, she is also a singer who performed the song A Canim Aman in the film Whisper If I Forget. Her performance is also featured on the original soundtrack for the film.
